text: @Mike_Pence Hey Mikey, taxpayers do not pay for abortions!  You can say it all day, but it will still be a lie!  Maybe worry about the 'precious lives' of folks dying of Covid19 (140K & climbing).  You & your boss are basically murderers.  All for the almighty dollar!  You're no Christian!
